movies.title: Vares - The Sheriff
movies.plot: Private Eye Jussi Vares finds two dead bodies in a remote house. A year later, Vares is hired to investigate the case. Vares gets dangerously close to the "Council" - a secret gentlemen's club, the head of which is "The Sheriff". To the members of the Council, human life is cheap. The identity of the Sheriff is revealed - but will he face justice for his crimes in a court of law? Will these evil deeds go unpunished.
movies.simplePlot: Private Eye Jussi Vares finds two dead bodies in a remote house. A year later, Vares is hired to investigate the case. Vares gets dangerously close to the "Council" - a secret gentlemen's ...

biography.bio: Antti Reini was born on August 27, 1964 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor, known for The Man Without a Past (2002), Il capitano (1991) and Sincerely Yours in Cold Blood (2000).
biography.name: Antti Reini

biography.bio: Jasper Pääkkönen, according to Finnish tabloid Ilta Sanomat, is "the most profitable film actor in Finland" for having starred in three of Finland's biggest box office hits during his career. Many of Pääkkönen's films have made #1 in the Finnish box office, including Pahat Pojat (Bad Boys - a true story) which is the all time most successful film in the Finnish box office. Other Pääkkönen's commercial and critical successes include Matti (#2 in Finland's all time box office), Frozen Land and Lapland Odyssey. For his role in Pahat Pojat, Pääkkönen was awarded Best Actor Award in Brussels International Independent Film Festival. He has earned international praise from film critic Michael Giltz from Huffington Post who called the actor "handsome and compelling" in his role in Lapland Odyssey. Film critic Leslie Felperin from Variety named Pääkkönen a "rising thesp, showing impressive range" in his starring role in Matti. In 2006 the European Film Promotion introduced Pääkkönen as the Shooting Star of Finland at the Berlin international film festival. Apart from his work in film, in 2009 Pääkkönen founded the Pokerisivut.com poker magazine together with film producer Markus Selin. In 2010 Pokerisivut.com was awarded Best Overall Affiliate at the London 2010 iGB Affiliate Awards. Pääkkönen is a member of the Vision Fly Fishing world team and has appeared in fly fishing TV shows and DVD's as a celebrity guest.
biography.name: Jasper Pääkkönen

biography.bio: Jukka-Pekka Palo was born on August 7, 1954 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor, known for Shadows in Paradise (1986), A Taste of Success (1983) and Flight North (1986). He has been married to Riitta Anttonen since 1981. They have two children.
biography.name: Jukka-Pekka Palo

biography.bio: Jukka Puotila was born on September 9, 1955 in Helsinki, Finland as Jukka Petri Pauli Puotila. He is an actor and writer, known for Kotikatu (1995), Ruusun aika (1990) and Dirty Bomb (2011).
biography.name: Jukka Puotila

biography.bio: Karoliina Blackburn was born on November 23, 1972 in Helsinki, Finland. She is an actress and writer, known for Badding (2000), Star Wreck: In the Pirkinning (2005) and Pirunpelto (2009).
biography.name: Karoliina Blackburn

biography.bio: Jarmo Perälä was born on April 25, 1963. He is an actor, known for Matti: Hell Is for Heroes (2006), Splendeur et misère de la humaine (1988) and Frozen Land (2005).
biography.name: Jarmo Perälä

biography.bio: Miska Kaukonen is an actor, known for Frozen Land (2005), Nightsatan and the Loops of Doom (2013) and Tears of April (2008).
biography.name: Miska Kaukonen

biography.bio: Konsta Mäkelä was born on June 21, 1965 in Espoo, Finland. He is known for his work on Very Cold Trip (2010), Guerre d'hiver (1989) and Naked Harbour (2012).
biography.name: Konsta Mäkelä

biography.bio: Hannele Laaksonen was born on December 23, 1950 in Loimaa, Finland as Irma Hannele Laaksonen. She is an actress, known for Promesse (2005), Kiss Me in the Rain (1999) and Pimennys (1993). She has been married to Ilkka Vanne since 1977. They have one child.
biography.name: Hannele Laaksonen

biography.bio: Robert Enckell was born on December 18, 1959 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor, known for Armi Alive! (2015), La rédemption (1997) and Ambush (1999).
biography.name: Robert Enckell

biography.bio: Mikko Kouki was born on September 14, 1967 in Lohja, Finland. He is known for his work on Frozen Land (2005), Beauty and the Bastard (2005) and Lovers & Leavers (2002).
biography.name: Mikko Kouki

biography.bio: Mika Kujala was born on March 22, 1960 in Forssa, Finland as Mika Jussi Kujala. He is an actor, known for Adult Camp (2015), Love and Other Troubles (2012) and Vares - The Sheriff (2015). He has been married to Riitta Salminen since 1990. They have two children.
biography.name: Mika Kujala

biography.bio: Ilkka Heiskanen was born on January 11, 1962 in Hamina, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Beyond Enemy Lines (2004), The Mercenary Soldier (1997) and Silence (2011).
biography.name: Ilkka Heiskanen

biography.bio: Eppu Salminen was born on December 10, 1965 in Lahti, Finland as Jarmo Juhani Salminen. He is an actor and writer, known for Adult Camp (2015), The Kiss of Evil (2011) and Garter Snake (2011). He has been married to Kaisa Kuikkaniemi since May 17, 2014. They have two children. He was previously married to Riitta Havukainen and Minna Turunen.
biography.name: Eppu Salminen

biography.bio: Matti Onnismaa was born on October 21, 1959 in Finland. He is an actor and director, known for Drifting Clouds (1996), Guerre d'hiver (1989) and Les lumières du faubourg (2006).
biography.name: Matti Onnismaa
